content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Line at position(x=1-3, y=1-3.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Two stone furnaces at positions (x=1.0, y=1.0) and (x=3.0, y=1.0)
- Two burner inserters at positions (x=1.5, y=2.5) and (x=3.5, y=2.5)
- Two wooden chests storing iron plates at positions (x=1.5, y=3.5) and (x=3.5, y=3.5)

### Additional Storage at position(x=5.5, y=2.5-3.5)
Consists of:
- Burner inserter at position (x=5.5, y=2.5)
- Wooden chest at position (x=5.5, y=3.5)

### Copper Plate Production Line at position(x=2-4.5, y=7-9.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Two stone furnaces at positions (x=2.0, y=7.0) and (x=4.0, y=7.0)
- Two burner inserters at positions (x=2.5, y=8.5) and (x=4.5, y=8.5)
- Two wooden chests storing copper plates at positions (x=2.5, y=9.5) and (x=4.5, y=9.5)

### Power Generation System at position(x=-5.5-13.5, y=26.5-35.5)
Consists of:
- Two offshore pumps at positions (x=-5.5, y=26.5) and (x=2.5, y=35.5)
- Boiler at position (x=7.0, y=35.5)
- Steam engine at position (x=13.5, y=35.5)
- Two pipe groups:
  - Water pipes connecting offshore pump to boiler
  - Steam pipes connecting boiler to steam engine
- Electricity distribution network with multiple electric poles

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when attempting to craft items requiring assembly
- Items like labs, electronic circuits, and copper cables cannot be crafted by hand when they require assembly machines
- Set up proper assembly line with required machines before attempting to craft these items
- Ensure you have all prerequisite structures and materials before starting automation research

### Disconnected fluid system
- One offshore pump (at x=-5.5, y=26.5) is not connected to any fluid system
- Ensure all fluid-carrying entities are properly connected with pipes to form a complete system
